fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON CHEATING
fields.Description:
* Rat or don't rat out cheating Gaston
* What Game is this?

fields.Title: START
input
You: ""I know what I saw, cheater.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know what I saw, cheater."

fields.Title: Logic: "All that blunt data must have trigg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All that blunt data must have triggered an information hoarding reflex of sorts. Think of it like a small seizure. It will pass.

fields.Title: You: ""This is getting weird, better hit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is getting weird, better hit the brakes."

fields.Title: Half Light: "... aaaaaand that's how you break a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... aaaaaand that's how you break a man if the good cop and the bad cop have left for the day. Disturbing Cop to the rescue!

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Uh... thanks. Is there something w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh... thanks. Is there something we can help you with, officer?" He avoids your gaze.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Logic: "Oh, he knows what you mean. Keeping..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, he knows what you mean. Keeping it to yourself now, may yield some leverage if you ever need it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't like where this is going,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't like where this is going, officer. Don't you think we should do something else now?"

fields.Title: You: ""Sure. We got a case to solve!" [Le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure. We got a case to solve!" [Leave.]

fields.Title: Volition: "Let's cool Mr. Fight-Or-Flight down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's cool Mr. Fight-Or-Flight down, before he kills someone. He gets overstimulated. But seriously, enough with the pétanque already.

fields.Title: You: ""No. I want to talk to him. I promi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I want to talk to him. I promise it won't be about pétanque."

fields.Title: You: ""I saw what you did there, Gaston...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I saw what you did there, Gaston. How's your back?"

fields.Title: You: ""Getting older does present a whole..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Getting older does present a whole new set of challenges..." (Keep it to yourself.)

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Lately my eyes just aren't the sam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lately my eyes just aren't the same and even getting out of the bed is pretty difficult..."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Of course, officer." He waits for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, officer." He waits for you to speak.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Well... first you draw a circle ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well... first you draw a circle about a half a metre in diameter. We made ours out of rope," he explains. "Then the order of play is determined by a coin toss. You win it -- you get to throw the *cochonnet*."

fields.Title: Drama: "This guy can act. Not sure I would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy can act. Not sure I would have caught it if we hadn't *seen* him cheating.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "Hurry up then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs. "Hurry up then."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Can you believe this clown?! This i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can you believe this clown?! This is information you MUST have and he's stalling. Lives *could* be on the line and he's just running out the clock?!

fields.Title: You: ""Interesting. Tell me more about it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interesting. Tell me more about it."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Then the players aim to throw thei..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then the players aim to throw their *boules* as close to the *cochonnet* as possible. They must stay in the circle and keep both feet planted."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Why don't the two of you get a tom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why don't the two of you get a tomb and take your whining there." He looks at you, disgusted. "I am ashamed to even stand in the same crater with you."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Gaston Martin: ""*So* weird... what was that, offic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*So* weird... what was that, officer?" The old man is visibly shaken, but tries to force a smile. "Actually, *please*, let's talk about something else."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Six months go by and I realize you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Six months go by and I realize you must think I've gone blind from all the shrapnel in my head. Because only a blind man wouldn't see through that."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Oh? The goal is to throw your *bou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh? The goal is to throw your *boule*..." He holds out the orb. "... as close to the *cochonnet* as you can."
fields.Alternate1: "Yes, pétanque. The goal is to throw the *boule*..." He holds out the orb. "... as close to the *cochonnet* as you can."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Easy now, René." He snickers. "I *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy now, René." He snickers. "I *will* join the seniors swimming class later, but right now I don't want to keep the officer waiting -- police business is usually urgent."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Yes, yes. I'm sorry, officer." The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes. I'm sorry, officer." The senior is visibly shaking before you.

fields.Title: Logic: "Oh, he must have already figured ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, he must have already figured out Gaston's cheating.

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should leave quickly before it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should leave quickly before it happens again." He looks around. "Right now is a good moment."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
You: ""Nothing... just a lowly law-man ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing... just a lowly law-man rambling to himself." (Tap on the side of your nose.) "Watch that back."

fields.Title: Composure: "He got the message."
fields.Dialogue Text: He got the message.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""You were a rat when we were boys a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were a rat when we were boys and you are a rat now. Of course I knew!" He spits. "Your deception was so bad at first I thought you were play-acting for my amusement."

fields.Title: You: ""Trivial? Ha. Ahaha." (Grin at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Trivial? Ha. Ahaha." (Grin at the man.) "You can still tell me, you know. Before anything *happens*."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""That's the *cochonnet*." He points..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's the *cochonnet*." He points to a small wooden ball in the middle of the crater.

fields.Title: You: ""Cut the crap, bozo! I saw you chea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cut the crap, bozo! I saw you cheating!"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "That hurt. The man knows where to s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That hurt. The man knows where to sting.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Who did you think you were fooling..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who did you think you were fooling with your moaning, Gaston?" He doesn't even glance at his partner.

fields.Title: You: ""Why don't *you* get a tomb yoursel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why don't *you* get a tomb yourself!"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Already got one, smart ass." He ut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Already got one, smart ass." He utters through his teeth. "Comes with the rank and my service record."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""What do you mean, officer?" He loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean, officer?" He looks startled.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Variable["plaza.gaston_talked_about_jeanmarie"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_talked_about_jeanmarie"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_talked_about_jeanmarie"])
Rhetoric: "If you wanna expose him, get straig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you wanna expose him, get straight to the point. If you start japing about old age, it's *never* gonna happen.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Yes, officer, yes!!! I swear, I do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, officer, yes!!! I swear, I don't know anything else about pétanque! It's all I know, I swear!"

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""I could, but I'd rather not." He s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I could, but I'd rather not." He smiles. "I don't want to take up your time with trivial details, officer."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What was that all about? Some expe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What was that all about? Some experimental interrogation technique you're honing?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Just please ask them normal questio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just please ask them normal questions.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""The opponent has a right to re-mea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The opponent has a right to re-measure if he has doubts about the result and..." He is trying to think of something else to say, but then -- seeing your beady eyes -- stops.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""What?!" The man tries to act surpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?!" The man tries to act surprised.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Half Light: "Yes, yes, you do. Knowledge is powe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, yes, you do. Knowledge is power, bathe in it, empower yourself, trust me.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Ugh... it's not very good, officer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ugh... it's not very good, officer. I'm an old man and sciatica is gnawing on my joints." There's a look of hopelessness in his eyes. "Some days the pain is almost too much..."

fields.Title: You: ""I think that's all I need to know..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think that's all I need to know about pétanque."
fields.Alternate1: "Good, good, Gaston... see, how it's all *good* now?"

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_infodump"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_infodump"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_infodump"])
You: ""I was hoarding information and had..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was hoarding information and had a seizure. I'm fine now."

fields.Title: Drama: "He's faking."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's faking.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""*Pardon*, René," he quickly turns..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Pardon*, René," he quickly turns back to you. "We must pick this up later, I'm helping the officer right now."

fields.Title: You: ""Stop stalling and talk, goddamnit!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop stalling and talk, goddamnit! Is that all?! Cause I swear to god, if you're holding back..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "That guy is a fraud."
fields.Dialogue Text: That guy is a fraud.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Gaston Martin: ""I don't understand, René..." He lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't understand, René..." He looks around with an expression of complete bafflement.

fields.Title: You: ""I think I get it. Thanks, Gaston!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I get it. Thanks, Gaston!"

fields.Title: You: ""Is there *anything* else you can t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is there *anything* else you can tell me about pétanque?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "Is he *denying* you information, wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is he *denying* you information, when you clearly requested it?! That's it. We're blowing the lid off this man-jar! You *need* to know... things!

fields.Title: You: ""Should've built yourself a better..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Should've built yourself a better body, Mossback. The kind that lasts." (Secretly flex.)

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm relieved to hear that." He pee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm relieved to hear that." He peers at you over his glasses. "Are you well enough to move on to something else now?"

fields.Title: You: ""The hangovers must be getting wors..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The hangovers must be getting worse too... Don't think I used to lose my memory every time I had a little drink..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque]
Jump to: [You: ""I think that's all I need to know..."]
You: ""That sounds blissful, but right no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That sounds blissful, but right now I've got some questions for Gaston."

fields.Title: You: ""Honestly, I don't know what it was.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I don't know what it was."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_halflight_more_petanque"])
You: ""Actually...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Gaston main HUB]
Gaston Martin: ""But *not* with a monetary pension..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But *not* with a monetary pension unfortunately," the checkered suit snaps at his partner and turns to you. "What can I do for you, officer?"

fields.Title: You: "But do I really and *why*?"
fields.Dialogue Text: But do I really and *why*?

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, how did you know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, how did you know?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know a *Weird Cop* when I see on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know a *Weird Cop* when I see one." The lieutenant adjusts his glasses. "It doesn't work. *Weird Cop* only confuses the suspect and the *Weird Cop* himself, while all he should have done was ask normal questions."

fields.Title: godoworkyoufuck
Logic: "He's known Gaston all his life. Pro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's known Gaston all his life. Probably knows his every move better than himself. Of course he saw right through the deceit.

fields.Title: Variable["XP.gaston_said_rene_guardjob_is_evrarts_charity"]
Variable["XP.gaston_said_rene_guardjob_is_evrarts_charity"]
!(Variable["XP.gaston_said_rene_guardjob_is_evrarts_charity"])
Jump to: [You: ""I think I get it. Thanks, Gaston!""]
Gaston Martin: ""Uh..." Your keen interest is makin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh..." Your keen interest is making him uncomfortable. "Then there's measuring the distance between the *boule* and the *cochonnet*. I always measure ours, but usually it's done by the player who threw last."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""I know what you mean, officer," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know what you mean, officer," he says excitedly. "Then there's the blood sugar and don't even get me started on the bladder troubles..."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Goddamn right, son!" The old soldi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamn right, son!" The old soldier nods in agreement. "No use complaining about it."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.gaston_did_not_rat_gaston"]
Variable["plaza.gaston_did_not_rat_gaston"]
!(Variable["plaza.gaston_did_not_rat_gaston"])
René Arnoux: ""Good. Gaston finally understands t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Gaston finally understands the rules now." An evil smile runs across his lips. "Let's see if it makes him a better *petanquista*."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""You'll put that knowledge to good..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You'll put that knowledge to good use in twenty... I mean fifty years. I'm sure of that officer."
